author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Qualcomm Says CFIUS Found National Security Risks In Broadcom's Proposed Deal
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Qualcomm Inc:
* QUALCOMM SAYS “BROADCOM’S CLAIMS THAT THE COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN INVESTMENT IN THE U.S. (CFIUS) INQUIRY WAS A SURPRISE TO THEM HAS NO BASIS IN FACT”
* BROADCOM HAS BEEN INTERACTING WITH CFIUS “FOR WEEKS” AND MADE TWO WRITTEN SUBMISSIONS TO CFIUS
* CFIUS DETERMINED THERE ARE “NATIONAL SECURITY RISKS” TO THE U.S. RELATED TO DEAL PROPOSED BY BROADCOM Further company coverage:
